events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering based on your experience and skillset.
A recruiter has been assigned to your file to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We have conducted the initial screening call and are impressed with your background and technical knowledge.
Thank you for your prompt response and for clarifying your previous project experience in detail.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 10 AM UTC with our senior developer team.
The technical interview was successfully completed; the panel appreciated your coding skills and problem-solving approach.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 18th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, with positive feedback regarding your communication skills and alignment with company values.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer, and we are happy to address your questions about the role and package.
You have accepted our offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a valued member of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, and you will receive resources and instructions to get you set up with our systems.
The recruitment process is now complete. We have officially welcomed you to the team and look forward to your contributions.
